name: Neon Maze (Respawned Gamers!)
description:
You are a captain of a spaceship. Your spaceship just crashed and due to some weird effect in the galaxy, you are thrown into an alternate reality.

It is full of NEON colored rays and lights. All objects are also NEON. Your ship's emergency pod is still working, but the keys are spread across the space maze tunnel. Find those keys and exit this mind-bending place.
